Reviews.Title: “Bugs and small”
Reviews.Author: Rattigirl
Reviews.Content: We booked jut for a few hours sleep. Price was good and front desk clerk was very nice and helpful. She even walked over a plunger when the toilet clogged. It was 2am we jut wanted a hotel to sleep for a few hours after driving for 15 straight. Anyway spotted a black bug looked like a centipede but my son missed it and it hide behind the tv unit. As soon as we turned off the lights my husband felt something on him turned on the light and it was a roach the size of an pink single erasers ou use to use in school on his bed. Disgusting. Needless to say he killed it and I shook our things and ran out. Got our mony back but will never ever stay in a days inn like this again. So gross. I don't recommend. This place should be shut dOwn. I just hope I didn't take one with me.

Reviews.Title: “This place is NASTY”
Reviews.Author: Rick S
Reviews.Content: We recently booked three hotel rooms at this location. We thank god the room we booked for our friends was half way decent. OUR room was NASTY, we paid extra to get a king size room. The bed was out of the 70's and hourly hotel decor - mirrored head board and all. The molding on the head board was falling off. the rest of the furniture was out of the 70's as well including the STAINS on the dresser. The refridgerator did not work. Also, every corner of the room looked as if no one vaccummed in months DUST & COBB WEBBS. I killed several bugs and a couple large brown spiders. DO NOT STAY HERE!!!!! It is a shame this place is right off the highway and convienent BUT NASTY.

Reviews.Title: “New Owners and Big Changes Coming!!”
Reviews.Author: ginny110411
Reviews.Content: Stayed here a number of times but the services and rooms were obviously on a steady decline. Not to be prejudiced, but a certain ethic group takes over a lot of these hotels and run them into the ground. The bank stepped in on this one and improvements are being made immediately! There is plenty of tractor-trailer parking in the rear. It is pet friendly with a fee. Pillow top mattresses are on order, the rooms will be refurbished shortly and the entire place will be made over. At the front desk, Melinda is a pleasure to deal with and is the new front manager. The rooms are adequate but as said, big changes and a make over are long over due and coming very soon. Everyone is thrilled about it! With the Daytona Speedway and Flea Market near by as well as a multitude of shops and places to eat, this hotel will be in heavy demand! Looking forward to staying here when we are in the area! And to the upcoming changes! All for the good!

Reviews.Title: “crack heads & prostitutes”
Reviews.Author: NEWJERSEYSCOTTIEG
Reviews.Content: stay here for the daytona 500 we booked it for 3 nights and stay only one.we got into town late and had no choice we stayed up all night with a chair blocking our door because of the the crowd this place has there were prostitutes in the parking lot and drug deals going on as well do yourself a favor and stay far away from here

Reviews.Title: “Terrible place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: BachCam
Reviews.Content: Upon arrival, they couldn't find my reservation. Room had an overpowering smell of mold/mildew and floor looked and felt dirty. Also had problem with bugs.

Reviews.Title: “below basic, would rather camp”
Reviews.Author: 77airGlider
Reviews.Content: If you use Travelocity you are a second class customer, upon checkin they told us there would be a late check in , I said OK , it was 6:15 PM untill check in, travelocity users checked in last, inside the room was OK , Free WIFI works at 2:00 AM , no ice machine. (broken, all of them) we were there 5 days for bike week, no ice all week

Reviews.Title: “Disgustingly Dirty!”
Reviews.Author: iLAK_67
Reviews.Content: I booked online and got a rate of $130.00 which I thought was expensive, but didn't really have a choice....needed a room. The linens had not been changed since it was rented the night before. There was a burn hole in the sheets, all the way down to the mattress and it was still dirty. When I called the front desk, they couldn't come look so I had to take the sheets off and take them down for them to look at...It was 11 o'clock at night. They moved us to another room which was a pain because we had already put our stuff away. The first room didn't even have a refrigerator or microwave, but the one they moved us to did. The next day I tried to get a discount, but they couldn't return any money because I had booked online, so they said they would give me a 50% discount for my next visit. They can keep it, because I will NEVER stay at this hotel again. I will sleep in my car first. Extremely expensive for the crappy room you get.

Reviews.Title: “Gouged”
Reviews.Author: AnkenyKelly
Reviews.Content: Booked room online and was quoted $299 per night. Booked for 2 nights Sat & Sun. 2/19 & 2/20 during Daytona 500. Room was nasty.There was mold growing in the bathroom. No frig or microwave, no ice in the machine and they were charging others for extra parking spots. Went to ask for towels about 7 pm Sunday evening and was told couldn't get any because housekeeping was closed. Later I went and asked how much for a room and was told $89. Then I went back a little later and said I needed a key to my room. Guy asked me room # and gave me a key with NO ID.

Reviews.Title: “Low Price, Front Desk Staff Lacking”
Reviews.Author: Josh73
Reviews.Content: The housekeeping staff were kind, friendly, and did an excellent job servicing the room. The front desk staff were rude, unprofessional, and exhibited utterly poor communication skills.

Reviews.Title: “OK at best”
Reviews.Author: alpha03
Reviews.Content: I try to stay at Days Inn for frequent flyer miles. However it is getting harder and harder. The room was just clean enough. The woman at the front desk seemed bothered to have to check me in. Bathroom very dated...Next time I will hit one of the other many hotels on that exit and give up the miles

Reviews.Title: “great for the money & location”
Reviews.Author: roadrunner2000
Reviews.Content: price is right ,great location , decent rooms , very nice staff ,and very nice pool. newley renavated rooms. great for speedweek and bike week everythings right up the street.

Reviews.Title: “Bed Bugs & Scabies”
Reviews.Author: Brava1
Reviews.Content: Run!!! My whole family is now being treated for scabies after spending one night. We complained about bed bugs and roaches that we found, but management never returned our call. We even showed the bugs to the front desk. I called the board of health. This place is a traveler' nightmare. I will never stay at a Days Inn again!!

Reviews.Title: “Days Inn Speedway Needs Pitstop”
Reviews.Author: bilbo2231
Reviews.Content: Having stayed in ay Days Inns, I am normally satisfied with the quality of the chain. This room left little to recommend. I requested a smoke free room and was placed in a room that smelled like an ashtray!, The wood in the bathroom was rotted and we had uninvited roach for quest. The sheets reaked of smoke and I question when the last time they were washed. I would not recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Good for the price”
Reviews.Author: PamandPhil
Reviews.Content: We selected this hotel from a guide at the interstate rest stop. Rate was very reasonable $60. This is a budget hotel. Our check in was slow due to computer problems and the key did not work for the first room shown, but the staff was pleasant and helpful and immediately fixed the problem. The room was not fancy, but was comfortable, quiet, and clean. IHOP on premises was fast and friendly the next morning. A good experience overall.

Reviews.Title: “dirty, dirty, dirty”
Reviews.Author: calebt
Reviews.Content: When we went into the front desk all seemed well, until we drove around to our room. We should have left right then and there. There were broken down vehicles in the yard, more than one, they had been there awhile. It looked as though people had made it their permanent home. We went to our room and immediately you could smell mold. The room was in desperated need of a cleaning. Our socks were black from walking on the carpet. We found the smell, the bathroom, it had black mold on the ceiling and the tile in the bathroom was all cracked and moldy. We called the front desk and we were told we could not have a refund because we had already checked in. We wanted to leave and unfortunately we were booked for two nights. I called the reservation line for Days inn and he said they have had several complaints, but it was up to us to get a refund, they were only the reservation line. She gave me another number to call to report them and they didn't offer to help either as they told us this Days inn was independently owned. Needlessto say we stuck it out and survived, but it was not worth the $80.00 a night price tag.

HotelInfo.Name: Days Inn Speedway
HotelInfo.Address: 2900 International Speedway / I-95, Daytona Beach, FL 32124
